name: Unwilling Recruit
originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +X/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

rulings.text: You may target a creature you already control with Unwilling Recruit. If you do, you’ll gain control of that creature (which usually won’t have any visible effect), untap it, and it’ll get +X/+0 until end of turn.

text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +X/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
